headline: BofA Lifts Seagate Technology (STX) PT to $145 Following BofA Global Technology Conference
summary: Seagate Technology Holdings (NASDAQ:STX) is one of the 8 Best Inexpensive Stocks to Buy Right Now. On June 9, Bank of America raised its price target for Seagate to $145 from $135, while maintaining a Buy rating on the stock. This optimism follows the 2025 BofA Global Technology Conference, where the analyst gained a more […]
